information: Our company is a wholesale veterinary business located in Gijon, Asturias, in northern Spain. With over 25 years experience in the sector, in the beginning we specialized in the sale of medicines for production animals like cows and sheep. Over the years we were specializing in the distribution and sale of pet products, through our commercial sales, who visit all the pet stores and veterinary clinics in several provinces here in the north and centre of our country. We are interested to contact manufacturers of premium and super premium pet foods. Mainly holistic, natural, organic and organic foods. Also suppliers of all kinds of accessories and clothing for pets.
